name: Place of darkness
description: Level design for the first level of a small game.  It is the base design without many blueprints. Made in Unreal Engine 4. It is the intro level to the game, where it will introduce you to the smaller enemies at the start. You can then explore a little and it will lead you to a chest with a key in it allowing you to proceed through the level.  There are snake enemies that will considered more difficult. Followed by a boss version of the first enemy that the player faced. The goal of this level is to find your way out of the dungeon you find yourself in. The controls are basic controls with WASD for movement and the mouse to turn the camera.
